entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
